description: TBS Rates of Pay - federal public service pay scales by occupational group, level, and step for both excluded and represented employees

step.description: Pay step within level (typically 1-10, some up to 19)

effective_date.description: Date pay rate became effective (YYYY-MM-DD format)

is_represented.description: True if unionized/represented employee, False if excluded/unrepresented

collective_agreement.description: Collective agreement name if represented (null for excluded) - legacy column

collective_agreement_id.description: Foreign key to dim_collective_agreement for represented employees

pay_progression_type.description: Type of pay progression: 'step' (most common), 'performance', or 'hybrid'

notes: Contains pay rates for both excluded/unrepresented AND represented/unionized employees
is_represented=True: unionized employees from collective agreement annexes
Step progression varies by occupational group (1-10 typical, some up to 19)
Annual rates range from ~$36k to ~$200k+ CAD depending on classification
Effective dates reflect Treasury Board pay adjustments
Historical rates are preserved (multiple effective_dates per classification)
